short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saves logins to some websites -- currently only farnell.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't allow websites to automatically log you out!

Many websites attempt to increase security by automatically logging you out of your account.  Whilst this can be a good thing for the security clueless,  this can really upset those of us more tabularly inclined - who often miss the "cancel logout" messages.

https://github.com/egroat/LoginSaver
